name: Ricardo Rosset
introduction: Ricardo Rosset (born 27 July 1968 in So Paulo, Brazil) is a Brazilian former Formula One driver who competed between 1996 and 1998 with the Footwork, Lola and Tyrrell teams. He competed in 33 events, yet failed to attain any points during his Formula One career. After a difficult season in 1998, Rosset departed Formula One at the end of the year.
